find_path.description: Finds the shortest path on the current map using BFS. Avoids impassable tiles, objects, and unseen areas.

path_master.description: Finds the shortest path on the current map using A*. Avoids impassable tiles, objects, and unseen areas. It also correctly handles one-way tiles like ledges.

unstick_me_tool.description: Analyzes the map XML to find the nearest cluster of 'unseen' tiles when stuck. Returns coordinates for a new navigation goal. Can also check for softlock conditions (e.g., no path to any warp/exit).
